summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to 4chan Community Support LLC, demanding records related to specific 4chan post numbers. The subpoena is part of an investigation into alleged violations of federal conspiracy, false statements, and obstruction statutes, seeking user information and IP logs.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued and signed the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance Date
events.description: The subpoena commands the custodian of records for 4chan to appear before the grand jury to testify and produce records, unless records are produced in advance.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Manhattan, New York, NY
1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office subpoenaed 4chan for records related to four specific post numbers (222520442, 222518349, 222520257, 222518664).
The investigation involves alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 371 (conspiracy), 1001 (false statements), and 1519 (obstruction).
The subpoena seeks extensive user data including IP logs, account registration details, and service records.
The document shows federal investigators were examining online activity on 4chan as part of the Epstein case investigation in August 2019.
